languages.text: "Надеюсь, с целью служения Императору. Я ощущаю запах замысленного преступления впереди и молюсь, что Лорд-инквизитор прибыл сюда карать и предотвращать хулу на Него".
"To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, с целью служения Императору. Я ощущаю запах замысленного преступления впереди и молюсь, что Лорд-инквизитор прибыл сюда карать и предотвращать хулу на Него".

traits.locale_text: "To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I sense the scent of a crime conceived, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."
"To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I sense the scent of a crime conceived, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."
"To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."
"To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."
"To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."

languages.text: "Um dem Imperator zu dienen, möchte ich hoffen. Ich spüre den Gestank eines zukünftigen Verbrechens und bete dafür, dass der Lord Inquisitor gekommen ist, um die Schuldigen zu strafen und jedwede Blasphemie gegen Ihn zu verhindern."
languages.original_text: "To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."

traits.locale_text: "Um dem Imperator zu dienen, möchte ich hoffen. Ich spüre den Gestank eines zukünftigen Verbrechens und bete dafür, dass der Lord Inquisitor gekommen ist, um die Schuldigen zu strafen und jedwede Blasphemie gegen Ihn zu verhindern."

languages.text: « Pour servir l'Empereur, j'espère. Je décèle la pestilence d'un crime en devenir, et je prie pour que le seigneur inquisiteur soit venu punir et prévenir tout sacrilège à Son encontre. »
languages.original_text: "To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."

traits.locale_text: « Pour servir l'Empereur, j'espère. Je décèle la pestilence d'un crime en devenir, et je prie pour que le seigneur inquisiteur soit venu punir et prévenir tout sacrilège à Son encontre. »

languages.text: 「皇帝に仕えること、私はそれを望む。犯罪の匂いを嗅ぎ取り、ロード・インクィジターが主に対する冒涜を防ぎ、罰するためにここに来ていたのだと願っている」
languages.original_text: "To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝に仕えること、私はそれを望む。犯罪の匂いを嗅ぎ取り、ロード・インクィジターが主に対する冒涜を防ぎ、罰するためにここに来ていたのだと願っている」

languages.text: «Para servir al Emperador, espero. Detecto el olor de un crimen en ciernes, y rezo para que el Lord Inquisidor haya acudido a castigar y prevenir las blasfemias en Su contra».
languages.original_text: "To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."

traits.locale_text: «Para servir al Emperador, espero. Detecto el olor de un crimen en ciernes, y rezo para que el Lord Inquisidor haya acudido a castigar y prevenir las blasfemias en Su contra».

languages.text: “我希望他来这里是为了侍奉帝皇。我感觉到罪行即将发生，我希望大审判官来这里是为了阻止这场罪行，消灭一切亵渎神皇的行为。”
languages.original_text: "To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."

traits.locale_text: “我希望他来这里是为了侍奉帝皇。我感觉到罪行即将发生，我希望大审判官来这里是为了阻止这场罪行，消灭一切亵渎神皇的行为。”

languages.text: "İmparator'a hizmet etmek. En azından öyle umuyorum. Gerçekleşmekte olan bir suçun kokusunu alıyorum ve Lord Engizisyoncu'nun, O'na karşı dine aykırılıkları cezalandırmak ve engellemek için buraya gelmiş olması için dua ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "To serve the Emperor, I would hope. I detect the scent of a crime in the making, and pray that the Lord Inquisitor came here to punish and prevent blasphemy against Him."
